alert.note: Alert for Kootenai; Shoshone (Idaho) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Spokane (Eastern Washington and Northern Idaho)
info.headline: Flood Watch issued May 05 at 12:32PM MDT until May 07 at 7:17PM MDT by NWS Spokane
info.description: ...The Flood Watch is extended for the following rivers in Idaho... St Joe River at Calder affecting Shoshone County. Coeur d Alene River at Cataldo affecting Kootenai and Shoshone Counties. For the St. Joe River...including Calder, St Maries...flooding is possible. ...FLOOD WATCH NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL SUNDAY EVENING... * WHAT...Flooding is possible. * WHERE...Coeur d Alene River at Cataldo. * WHEN...Until Sunday evening. * IMPACTS...At 42.5 feet, Portions of Riverview Road between Cataldo and Kingston will be flooded, especially near Abby Road and below Fast Hill Road. Lowlands around Latour Creek Road will fill with water. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 10:15 AM PDT Friday the stage was 41.7 feet. - Forecast...Flood stage may be reached based on the latest forecast information. The river will be above bankfull or Action stage of 42.0 feet through the weekend. - Flood stage is 43.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood && Fld Observed Forecasts (11 am PDT) Location Stg Stg Day/Time Sat Sun Mon Coeur d Alene River Cataldo 43.0 41.7 Fri 10 am PD 42.4 42.1 41.4 &&
info.instruction: If you are in the watch area, remain alert to possible flooding. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. The next statement will be issued this evening at 1100 PM PDT.
